original_text: But some believers came out from the town and they stood around Paul. Then Paul stood up! He went back with them into the town.
korean_text: 제자들이 둘러섰을 때에 바울이 일어나 그 성에 들어갔다가 이튿날 바나바와 함께 더베로 가서

sentences.original_text: But some believers came out from the town
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 어떤 믿는 사람들이 마을에서 나왔고

sentences.original_text: He went back with them into the town
